ygData.subject: Discount on games
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I got a gamer friend who just started his business to sell PC games.  He can offer games at 10% discount off retail price. For those who already can
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I got a gamer friend who just started his business to sell PC games. He
can offer games at 10% discount off retail price.

For those who already can get better discount from ya source, just ignore
this email. For those who think this is a better price for u, u can
contact this person:

Jeff
HP: 96817470 or 93875129
Email: wrx555@...

Take note that it's SELF-COLLECTION (you guys arrange for a meet-up place
among yaself).

DISCLAIMER: I dun get any commission on these deals, just helping friends.
If u need to order anything, dun go thru' me. Instead pls contact Jeff
directly, thx.

Btw, I'm getting my copy of EQ: SoV from him, hehe.

Ziltus (EQ Innoruuk)
Dark Flame (UO Baja)
Ziltus (D2 USwest)
Raffles (Lineage Beta)
